ygData.subject: BEST group (I hate typos I make :), was Re: beast group (was Re: [Digest Number 83]))
ygData.msgSnippet: Me too!  The first thing I do when I log on is hit the Run key :), and then my Friends button.  Then I ask all the ones who are anon where they are. :) I ve
ygData.messageBody:
Me too! The first thing I do when I log on is hit the Run key :), and then
my Friends button. Then I ask all the ones who are anon where they are. :)

I've had some fun without a group, recently in Highpass. Nobody wanted to
group with my level 18 ogre basher, so he just joined in the free-for-all
fray. Much to my surprise he was able to do enough damage to get some of
the kills if there were multiple mobs! So I started saying things like "Yah
meez da bestest barsher round!" /em flexes his muscles "Me kills da orcs
gud!" Everyone around was laughing. :) I love that.

> From: "John Carney" <jcarney@...>
>
> Amen!
>
> I've found I can group with most any class combo, it just changes how we
> play and what kind of monsters we attack. If the group is heavy in
casters,
> we take on bigger things less often. If I'm grouped with four other meelee
> classes, its an endless stream of blues. It pays to be flexibile.
>
> But, it is the grouping I really enjoy. I love the interaction. I try to
> make heavy use of the /friends list.
